description: Object containing information about an end of year estimate for the retrieved tax calculation.

incomeSourceId.description: The unique identifier of the income source.

incomeSourceType.description: A list of income source types.

taxableIncome.description: Estimated taxable income. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

finalised.description: A boolean indicating whether income source has been finalised for the tax year (only applies to self-employment and UK property income types). The value must be true or false.

totalEstimatedIncome.description: Total estimated income. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalTaxableIncome.description: Total taxable income. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

incomeTaxAmount.description: Income tax amount. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

nic2.description: Class 2 NICs. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

nic4.description: Class 4 NICs. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalTaxDeductedBeforeCodingOut.description: Total tax deducted before coding out. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

saUnderpaymentsCodedOut.description: Self Assessment underpayments coded out. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalNicAmount.description: Total NIC amount. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalStudentLoansRepaymentAmount.description: Total student loans repayment amount. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalAnnuityPaymentsTaxCharged.description: Total annuity payments tax charged. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalRoyaltyPaymentsTaxCharged.description: Total royalty payments tax charged. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalTaxDeducted.description: Total tax deducted. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

incomeTaxNicAmount.description: Income Tax and NIC amount. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

cgtAmount.description: Capital Gains Tax amount. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

incomeTaxNicAndCgtAmount.description: Income Tax, NIC and CGT Amount. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
